inclusion.criterion: Age >18 years at the time of the procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Known or suspected lung cancer based on imaging (CT and/or PET/CT)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Endosonography (EBUS and/or EUS) indicated for intrathoracic lymph node
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: assessment/sampling according to national and international guidelines: 1) enlarged (>1 cm on its short axis at CT) and/or PET positive lymph node; and/or 2) conditions at risk for occult mediastinal metastases, such as: i) central primary tumor; ii) primary tumor > 3 cm; iii) PET negative primary tumor; iv) ipsilateral hilar metastasis (cN1 status).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Compromised upper airway (i.e., concomitant head and neck cancer with upper airway obstruction; critical central airway obstruction from any cause)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication for temporary interruption of the use of antiplatelet (excluded aspirin) or anticoagulant drugs
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has compromised upper airway due to concomitant head and neck cancer with upper airway obstruction.
